document_data.name: ''Traveler's pearl''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Traveler's pearls''''' were [[magic item]]s created by [[marid]] and given to mortals.
document_data.Description: This item appeared as a large [[pearl]] with rosy coloration. It gave of a slight hint of [[alteration]] magic.
document_data.Powers: If given as a gift, the previous owner of the ''traveler's pearl'' could speak a command word and ''[[teleport]]'' themselves and a companion to the pearl's current location, often resulting in the old owner being transported directly into the new owner's treasury. They pearl was destroyed once the previous owner uttered the command word.
